golden_diagnosis: Neonatal Marfan syndrome,Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome,马方综合征/Marfan syndrome; MFS/Marfan syndrome
predict_diagnosis:
Possible diagnoses include:

1. Duchenne muscular dystrophy
2. Myotonic dystrophy
3. Marfan syndrome
4. Ehlers-Danlos syndrome
5. Neurofibromatosis type 1
6. Tuberous sclerosis
7. Scoliosis
8. Polychondritis
9. Spinal muscular atrophy
10. Mast cell activation syndrome (MCAS)
